cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on October 26, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5658, DHS Roles and Responsibilities in Cyber Space Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 185 (Thursday, October 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BACON:
H.R. 5658.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8: ``The Congress shall have power to .
. . provide for the common defense. . . ''
[Page H5791]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: DHS Roles and Responsibilities in Cyber Space Act
